caption.p: Comparison between bare AC and ZnO-coated AC samples using 400 ms pulse time: ( a) C-V of 20-cycle ZnO-coated at 150 °C; ( b) C-V of ZnO-coated sample at 70 °C and 150 °C; ( c) Electrochemical impedance spectrum of bare AC and coated AC at various conditions; ( d) Cyclic stability at 3.2 V and /50 mA for 5000 cycles of various samples.
